definition: good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together

sentences.english: The female of the  species is very  aggressive.
sentences.chinese: 這個物種中雌性是非常好鬥的。

sentences.english: A men is virile only when he is belligerent .
sentences.chinese: 男人只有在好鬥的時候纔像男人。

sentences.english: China has appeared truculent recently in the face of challenges to its human rights record.
sentences.chinese: 中國最近在自己人權記錄方面展示了好鬥性。

sentences.english: Daring, spirited and entertaining, he brought smiles to the faces of spectators the world over.
sentences.chinese: 勇敢好鬥，觀賞性強，他使全世界的觀衆樂在其中。

sentences.english: A retired litigator misses the challenge to her pugnacious intellect.
sentences.chinese: 一位退休的訴訟人懷念對其好鬥才智的挑戰。

sentences.english: In order to survive, he had to be scrappier and more resourceful than his peers.
sentences.chinese: 迫不得已，蘭波變得比同輩更加好鬥和機警。

sentences.english: Bellicose rhetoric most often serves as an excuse for inaction.
sentences.chinese: 好鬥的言辭常常是無所作爲的藉口。

sentences.english: Cruelty and the fighting instinct have not yet been bred out of the human species.
sentences.chinese: 殘忍和好鬥的天性並未從人類消除。

sentences.english: The dog was angry and bellicosely bristled up.
sentences.chinese: 狗發怒，毛髮倒豎，顯出一副好鬥的兇相。

sentences.english: Mars on the 4th cusp, squared – aggressive father.
sentences.chinese: 可能火星四宮頭也表示好鬥的父親。

sentences.english: The boy was running around with a chip on his shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 這男孩東奔西跑，到處遊逛，擺出一副好鬥的姿態。

sentences.english: He was in no truculent state of mind now.
sentences.chinese: 這是他慣常的模樣，是一種好鬥的表情。

sentences.english: Because of all his fighting, Mittavinda was finally forced to run away from Benares.
sentences.chinese: 也由於好鬥，彌達維德最終被迫逃離了貝拿勒斯。

sentences.english: So it’s not hard to see where Eritrea gets its bunker mentality from.
sentences.chinese: 所以不難看出厄立特里亞人好鬥精神的來源了。

sentences.english: By nature, groundhogs are aggressive creatures.
sentences.chinese: 土撥鼠是一種天生好鬥的動物。

sentences.english: Males are both boisterous and aggressive in defending their territories;
sentences.chinese: 在保衛領地的時候，雄魚是即暴躁又好鬥的。

definition: variant of 兇惡|凶恶, fierce/ferocious/fiendish/frightening
scramble for power and profit (idiom); power struggle
to act in collusion (idiom); in cahoots with/villains will look after one another
